Problems in school?
Value: Go to school in clean clothes and come back in different, dirty clothing

Heading: Teased while in school?
Value: Yes, he had extremely large hands and would often switch his clothes with dirty ones he would find or trade with others.

Heading: Head injury?
Value:
Collided with street car and was unconscious for 6 days. 
Suffered headaches and memory loss. Fell from ladder at work. Caused vision issues, voices, and more mental problems.

Heading: Psychologically abused?
Value: Possibly his grandmother was a very strict Pentecostal and religion played a big part of his life. This could have lead to hate of women because he viewed women as a power figure.

Heading: Type of discharge
Value: Discharged for mental state and because of leaving and returning three times (each with problems)

Heading: Applied for job as a cop?
Fired from jobs?
Value: Yes-, couldn’t keep a job for more than a few days

Heading: Types of jobs worked
Value: Odd jobs depending on location. Robbery as well was involved.

Heading: Abused alcohol?
Value: Yes, would go to the docks at a very young age and get drunk picking up hookers
